title: @Riot - Rek'Sai
body: So I've been watching a lot of videos out of the PBE and noticed that Rek'Sai can often place a tunnel exit right on the edge of terrain where she goes through the wall but the portal doesn't end up on the same side of the wall as her - effectively giving her an extra flash worth of distance. This doesn't seem right, could you perhaps have a word with the RIOT overlords about that. #Rek'SaiMobilityOP
